action.action-desc: Mr. Fitzpatrick introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the termination of further retirement coverage of Members of Congress, except for the right to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan, and for other purposes.

section.header: Amendments relating to the Civil Service Retirement System

subsection.text: Subchapter III of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 8335 the following:

section.header: Termination of further retirement coverage of Members of Congress

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subchapter, effective as of the first day of the first Congress beginning after the date of the enactment of this section—

paragraph.text: a Member shall not be subject to this subchapter for any further period of time; and
no further Government contributions or deductions from basic pay may be made with respect to such Member for deposit in the Treasury of the United States to the credit of the Fund.

subsection.text: Nothing in subsection (a) shall be considered to nullify, modify, or otherwise affect any right, entitlement, or benefit under this subchapter with respect to any Member covering any period prior to the first day referred to in subsection (a).

subsection.header: Right To participate in Thrift Savings Plan not affected
subsection.text: Nothing in subsection (a) shall affect the eligibility of a Member to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan in accordance with otherwise applicable provisions of law.
Any regulations necessary to carry out this section may—

paragraph.text: be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management, except with respect to matters under paragraph (2); and
with respect to matters relating to the Thrift Savings Plan, be prescribed by the Executive Director (as defined by section 8401(13)).

subsection.text: The table of sections of chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 8335 the following:

toc.toc-entry: 8335a. Termination of further retirement coverage of Members of Congress.

section.header: Amendments relating to the Federal Employees’ Retirement System

subsection.text: Subchapter II of chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after section 8425 the following:

section.header: Termination of further retirement coverage of Members of Congress

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of this chapter, effective as of the first day of the first Congress beginning after the date of the enactment of this section—

paragraph.text: in the case of an individual who first becomes a Member before such first day—

subparagraph.text: such Member shall not be subject to this chapter for any further period of time after such first day or, if later, the date on which such Member completes at least 5 years of Member service; and

no further Government contributions or deductions from basic pay may be made with respect to such Member, for deposit in the Treasury of the United States to the credit of the Fund, after such Member ceases to be subject to this chapter; and

paragraph.text: in the case of an individual who first becomes a Member on or after such first day—

subparagraph.text: such Member shall not be subject to this chapter; and

no Government contributions or deductions from basic pay may be made with respect to such Member for deposit in the Treasury of the United States to the credit of the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund.

subsection.text: Nothing in subsection (a) shall be considered to nullify, modify, or otherwise affect any right, entitlement, or benefit under this chapter with respect to any Member covering any period prior to the first day referred to in subsection (a).

subsection.header: Right To participate in Thrift Savings Plan not affected
subsection.text: Nothing in subsection (a) shall affect the eligibility of a Member to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan in accordance with otherwise applicable provisions of law.
Any regulations necessary to carry out this section may—

paragraph.text: be prescribed by the Director of the Office of Personnel Management, except with respect to matters under paragraph (2); and
with respect to matters relating to the Thrift Savings Plan, be prescribed by the Executive Director (as defined by section 8401(13)).

subsection.text: The table of sections of chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 8425 the following:

toc.toc-entry: 8425a. Termination of further retirement coverage of Members of Congress.
